revised_title: Observations on Developmental Forms of Trypanosoma brucei in Gerbils
tldr: The author investigates the developmental forms of Trypanosoma brucei in gerbils, observing intra-corpuscular and extra-corpuscular forms in the spleen, axillary glands, and bone-marrow. The study provides insights into the morphology and development of the parasite, contributing to the understanding of trypanosome infections.
